function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decreased immigration and emigration of previous immigrants","Impact":"Recent arrivals may have more favorable outcomes while settled migrants may experience declined outcomes","Mitigation":"Encourage immigration and integrate settled migrants into the labor market","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Recent arrivals, settled migrants","Owner":"Government, labor market organizations"},{"Description":"Weak labor market attachment for refugees and family migrants","Impact":"Strong declines in numbers of new arrivals for these groups","Mitigation":"Provide support for labor market attachment and integration for refugees and family migrants","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Refugees, family migrants","Owner":"Government, NGOs"},{"Description":"Decline in use of posted workers during the pandemic","Impact":"Cushioning the impact on resident immigrants and the native-born","Mitigation":"Support the use of posted workers and consider their contribution to the labor force","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Resident immigrants, native-born","Owner":"Labor market organizations"}]}
